Location

At Home Sleep Studies

1661 East Flamingo Road

Suite 4B

Las Vegas, NV 89119

P: (702) 463-8062 F: (702) 463-8368

embedgooglemap.org
Google Maps Generator by embedgooglemap.org

We are located on the south side of Flamingo Road inside Cambridge Quail Property (Blue & White Sign) between Spencer and Maryland Parkway.

PLEASE USE SUITE 4-A DOOR FOR ENTRANCE

This is a one story red brick building. Our suite is located on the east-side of the complex about halfway down.
